title: #508: The Luciferian War Against Humanity with Matt Belair
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back Matt Belair to discuss how the elites are waging a pretty obvious full on Luciferian War on all fronts of our existence! This episode is a banger because a lot of the pieces of the puzzle come together. Thank you for your support.

Check out Sam Tripoli Live and grab your tickets at Samtripoli.com:
Nov 12th: Salt Lake City, Ut- The "Disobey" Crushfest live at Sugar Space Art Warehouse at 8pm!
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/sam-tripolis-disobey-crushfest-live-in-salt-lake-city-tickets-167982220343

https://nightout.com/events/comedy-night-at-mavericks-with-sam-tripoli/tickets
